name: Animatronix
description:
An entry for the screensaver jam by JW and Kitty Calis which has nothing to do with animatronics.

Coding, Art, Animation, Sound/Music, Everything done by DinoDoesStuff (@SuperMinerX on Twitter)

Made in around 4 or 5 hours

(Started 9:45pm - 11:45 on Saturday. Then Either 12:XX - 3:45 or 1:XX to 3:45)
